name: /vanity set-keyword
description: Set the vanity keyword e.g "/need", to detect if someone puts it in their status.

name: /vanity log-channel
description: Set the vanity logging channel to notify when someone puts the keyword in their status.

name: /vanity add-role
description: Add a role to the vanity roles list, roles will add if keyword is detected in status.

name: /vanity remove-role
description: Remove a role from the vanity roles list, roles will remove if keyword is no longer detected in status.

name: /vanity set-message
description: Set tthe vanity log message, this is the message that will send to the set log channel.

name: /vanity view-message
description: View the current vanity log message.
